content: chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s all in the chain space now miss out the 3 sts of the fan below treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 sts if you are unsure on this please look at the diagram for reference *chain 1 miss the next 2 sts make a v-s in the next st chain 1 miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st * repeat from * to * 9 more times treble_crochet double_crochet into the next st now miss the first 3 sts of the fan below in the chain space make 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s turn 3 sl-st into the first 3 sts and sl-st into the chain space chain 3 this is your first st in the same chain space make the following 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s now miss out the 3 sts of the fan below treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st *treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 1 make the following into the chain space of the v-s below puff st chain 1 puff st chain 1 puff st chain 1 * repeat from * to * 9 more times treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st now miss the first 3 sts of the fan below and in the chain space make the following 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s turn 4 sl-st into the first 3 sts and sl-st into the chain space chain 3 this is your first st in the same chain space make the following 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s now miss out the next 3 sts of the fan below treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 sts *chain 1 now treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space between the 1st and second puff st chain 1 now treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space between the 2nd and 3rd puff st chain 1 treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st * repeat from * to * 9 more times treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st now miss the first 3 sts of the fan below in the chain space make 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s turn now this is where i change things a little i don t want to make fans on the end of every row because it distorts the shape so on this row we will miss the fan out i ll show you how on row 5 5 sl-st into the first 3 sts sl-st into the chain space chain 3 now miss the 3 sts of the fan below treble_crochet double_crochet into every st and chain space across the row stop when you get the the fan below you should have 63 sts in total chain 3 and sl-st into the chain space of the fan below turn 6 chain 3 this is your first
